thread.section_title: Avis marchands de Euroflorist Belgique / België | Avis - Euroflorist Belgique / België | www.euroflorist.be
thread.title: L Morrison
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Belgique / België évalué par L Morrison

author: L Morrison
title: L Morrison
text: The website was easy to navigate & use. Excellent selection of flowers that were reasonably priced. Was a bit worried about ordering as the order was from the UK for delivery in Belgium using a company I had not dealt with before. Very pleased to say that the flowers were delivered on time and were even better than expected.
